task.title: How to Join a Voice Channel
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to join a voice channel.

taskbody.prereq: To join a channel you need to have your own server or to have joined one.

context.p: Voice Channels make hanging out easier - they require no ringing - only to be in the same server with your friends.

step.cmd: Click on the voice channel you want to join.

taskbody.result: If you have successfully joined the voice channel you will see your name in the channel as well as have a green sign that says Voice Connected.
